name: hello-world
description: Write here a description for your template
run: yarn add -D @babel/cli @babel/core @babel/node @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-typescript @commitlint/config-conventional @commitlint/cli @types/express @types/jest @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin babel-plugin-module-resolver commitizen cz-conventional-changelog eslint eslint-config-airbnb-base husky jest pinst ts-node-dev tsconfig-paths typescript ts-jest
yarn husky install && yarn husky add .husky/commit-msg "yarn commitlint --edit $1"
